Sentencas: A new and simple tape cast process has been developed for e.g. the fabrication of YSZ-electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC's).
Titulo: Aqueous tape casting of yttria stabilised zirconia using natural product binder

Sentencas: The method is environmentally friendly since it is water-based and uses a natural compound as a binder.
Titulo: Aqueous tape casting of yttria stabilised zirconia using natural product binder

Sentencas: The tape cast suspension was formulated taking into account a maximal solids loading, a minimum of organic compounds, colloidal stability, theological and wetting properties.
Titulo: Aqueous tape casting of yttria stabilised zirconia using natural product binder

Sentencas: Green sheets of variable thickness (50-400 mum) have been prepared.
Titulo: Aqueous tape casting of yttria stabilised zirconia using natural product binder

Sentencas: After sintering, dense and defect-free electrolyte material, as required for SOFC's, was obtained.
Titulo: Aqueous tape casting of yttria stabilised zirconia using natural product binder

Sentencas: The microstructure and the surface of the sintered sheet material were characterised with FESEM.
Titulo: Aqueous tape casting of yttria stabilised zirconia using natural product binder
